reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Foundiougne area food security programme

description.narrative: Food security in three sectors: sustainable livelihoods, adequate health care and healthy environment. Poverty and low food security is the main problem in rural area and the program improve living conditions and enchance livelihood in rural area. As resul t there are more microprojects, agri- and horticultural training, variation of good quality seeds, water supplies and sanitation in rural area of Foundiougne. By improving the health care households have better access to health services and morbidity is re duced also by health education., health education and environment protection training . Environment sector gives as results: ecological methods in agriculture, composts, biogas systems, recycling and better waste management. Beneficieries are communities i n rural area and especially women and children. Our implementing partner is Lutheran church of Senegal who has a long experience of work in the poorest rural areas and competency in water supply projects.
